results.text: ይህቺ ያቺ አመጸኞች በእርሷ ያስተባብሉባት የነበረችው ገሀነም ናት (ይባላሉ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሷና በጣም ሞቃት በኾነ ፍል ውሃ መካከል ይመላለሳሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በጌታውም ፊት መቆምን ለፈራ ሰው ሁለት ገነቶች አልሉት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
